title: NullReferenceException: NetworkAddressChanged was null.
body:
In an UWP application I attach an event handler to the NetworkChange.NetworkAddressChanged event of the System.Net.NetworkInformation assembly.
As soon as I unsubscribe the eventhandler (as I am no longer using it) I get a NullReferenceException as the Event is raised without any subscriptions.
The following exception occurred:
"System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkChange.**NetworkAddressChanged** was null."
The application crashes after this as this exception cannot be catched.
